mapper.sql: select y.yt_no, y.user_no, (select user_id from tb_user u where u.user_no = y.user_no) as user_id, y.yt_title, y.yt_content, y.yt_addr, y.yt_subject, y.yt_view_cnt, y.yt_like_cnt, (select count(*) from tb_comment c where code_value = (select code_value from tb_codenm where code_name ='온라인강의게시판') and c.board_post_no = y.yt_no) as yt_cmt_cnt, y.yt_addr_mod from tb_youtube y
mapper.select: select (select user_id from tb_user u where y.user_no = u.user_no) as user_id from tb_youtube y where yt_no = #{ytNo}
select max(yt_subject) as yt_subject, max(yt_addr_mod) as yt_addr_mod from tb_youtube group by yt_subject

select count(*) from tb_youtube
and yt_subject like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_title like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%' or yt_content like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_content like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_title like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_subject = #{ subj }

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (
and yt_subject like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_title like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%' or yt_content like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_content like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_title like '%' || #{search.searchWord} || '%'
and yt_subject=#{subj}
order by yt_no desc) a) where rnum between #{page.begin} and #{page.end}

select (select user_id from tb_user u where c.user_no = u.user_no) as user_id from tb_comment c where BOARD_POST_NO = #{no} and CODE_VALUE = (select code_value from tb_codenm where code_name='온라인강의게시판') order by cmt_no desc
select * from tb_comment where BOARD_POST_NO = #{ytNo} and CODE_VALUE = (select code_value from tb_codenm where code_name='온라인강의게시판') order by cmt_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_like values (#{ytNo}, #{userNo}, (select code_value from tb_codenm where code_name = '온라인강의게시판'))
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_like where board_post_no = #{no} and code_value = (select code_value from tb_codenm where code_name = '온라인강의게시판')
